overview: The simplicity of countryside people and the magical atmosphere of the rural space merge into a mysterious journey. Elderly people and children living magical moments, captivate us to read between the lines of their psychological state. These people expose the way they live, the genuine sparks of happiness blended with tragic strive for survival and a wait for death. With moments of silence, happiness and sadness, the film makes us feel the raw emotions of human life.
title: Moments of Silence
